stimulusHtml: A block of mass m is pulled across a rough horizontal surface at constant speed by a force of magnitude F, which acts at an angle of θ to the horizontal, as shown above. The coefficient of kinetic friction between the block and the surface is
choicesHtml: Fsinθ mg MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D99@

Fcosθ mg MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D94@

Fsinθ mg−Fcosθ MathType@MTEF@5@5@@43DA@

Fcosθ mg−Fsinθ MathType@MTEF@5@5@@43DA@
